alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:05PM CDT until June 19 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN UNION...SOUTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE AND NORTHERN LINCOLN PARISHES... At 1005 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Farmerville to 9 miles southeast of Homer, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Farmerville, Dubach, Vienna, Downsville, Spring Lake, D Arbonne, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Corinth, Shiloh, Mount Zion, Unionville and Aycock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
